trans-unit.source: Contains methods and properties that are used to manage queries to the tracking data that is contained in the SQL database used by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém métodos e propriedades que são usadas para gerenciar consultas para os dados de rastreamento que estão contidos no banco de dados SQL usado por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] SqlTrackingQuery provides methods and properties that you can use in order to access certain kinds of tracking data stored in a SQL database by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]SqlTrackingQuery fornece métodos e propriedades que você pode usar para acessar determinados tipos de dados armazenados em um banco de dados do SQL <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> de controle

trans-unit.source: Access to this data is provided through <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects.
trans-unit.target: Acesso a dados é fornecido por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> to try to get a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> for a specific workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A>para tentar obter um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho específico.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> to get a collection of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> objects that correspond workflow instances that have tracking data that matches a set of query parameters contained in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> that is passed as a parameter to the method.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A>para obter uma coleção de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>objetos que correspondem a instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que possuem o controle que corresponde a um conjunto de dados de consulta parâmetros contidos em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>que é passado como um parâmetro para o método.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance> class for more information about the kind of tracking data available and see the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> class for more information about the kind of queries that can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>de classe para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de dados disponíveis de controle e consulte o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions>classe para obter mais informações sobre o tipo de consultas que podem ser executadas.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> to a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>como uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> or an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A>ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A>ou um <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>será lançada.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.TryGetWorkflow%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.GetWorkflows%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A> property is initialized to `connectionString`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade é inicializada para `connectionString`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection string of the SQL database to query.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão do banco de dados SQL para a consulta.

trans-unit.source: connectionString is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: connectionStringé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The connection string of the SQL tracking database to query.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres de conexão do banco de dados de rastreamento SQL para a consulta.

trans-unit.source: A SQL database connection string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de conexão de banco de dados SQL.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set ConnectionString to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) was made.
trans-unit.target: Uma tentativa de definir ConnectionString para uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) foi feita.

trans-unit.source: Returns tracking data for a set of workflow instances that correspond to a set of query parameters specified by a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna controle de dados para um conjunto de instâncias de fluxo de trabalho que correspondem a um conjunto de consulta parâmetros especificados por um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"></xref> that specifies query parameters.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQueryOptions"> </xref> que especifica os parâmetros de consulta.

trans-unit.source: A list of objects that provide access to tracking data for the set of workflow instances with tracking data that matches the query parameters specified by options.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de objetos que fornecem acesso a dados para o conjunto de instâncias de fluxo de trabalho de controle com o controle de dados que corresponde aos parâmetros de consulta especificados pelo options .

trans-unit.source: options is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: optionsé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*>é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Tries to get query data for a specified workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Tenta obter dados de consulta para uma instância de fluxo de trabalho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which the tracking data is requested.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Guid>da instância do fluxo de trabalho para o qual os dados de rastreamento são solicitados.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, contains a <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"></xref> that provides access to the tracking data associated with the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, contém um <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingWorkflowInstance"> </xref> que fornece acesso aos dados de rastreamento associados com a instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitiailized.
trans-unit.target: Este parâmetro é passado uninitiailized.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if tracking data is available for the requested workflow instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dados de rastreamento estão disponível para a instância de fluxo de trabalho; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*> is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*>é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingQuery.ConnectionString*>
